alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ARTHUR...SOUTHERN CHERRY...NORTHEASTERN PERKINS...EASTERN KEITH...SOUTHEASTERN HOOKER...LINCOLN...LOGAN...MCPHERSON...NORTHWESTERN CUSTER... SOUTHWESTERN BLAINE AND THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT/730 PM MDT/... At 736 PM CDT/636 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds from thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from near Thedford to 9 miles north of Tryon to 9 miles north of Lemoyne. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Thedford, Tryon, Sutherland, Hershey, Arnold, Paxton, Wallace, Maxwell, Anselmo, Elsie, Dunning, Halsey, Gandy, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Kingsley Dam, Ringgold, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area and Roscoe. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 200 and 265. Highway 61 between mile markers 91 and 119. Highway 92 between mile markers 134 and 138, and between mile markers 170 and 269. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 54. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 130 and 195. Highway 83 between mile markers 70 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins
